page.title: 04Dent C.of E.Primary School.
page.content: The school as we know it today was built in 1968,but this purpose built building incorporates the original National School,which is now known as the Memorial Hall, built in 1845 and serving as a school hall for dinners P.E.,dance,drama and music during the school day and being used as a village hall in the evenings and at weekends. The main building consists of three classrooms,staffroom and toilets. Because there are only 45 children on roll,one of our classrooms is used as a library and T.V.room.We have two full time teachers,one for one morning a week,a secretary for a few hours,a helper part time,a dinner lady,a cook with her helper and a cleaner come caretaker.The Junior teacher is also the headmisstress who is in charge of the school. {
